tool_description: The Technology Mash Live Market Data API [Updates every second] is a robust and dynamic platform designed to provide real-time stock market data. It is specifically tailored for developers, fintech companies, and financial analysts who require up-to-the-minute information on stock prices. Leveraging high-speed data retrieval and processing, this API offers a comprehensive overview of the stock market, making it an invaluable tool for anyone involved in financial markets, trading, or market an...
name: Technology Mash Market API
title: Technology Mash Market API

api_list.name: Get Live Stock Quote Data Real Time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-mash-market-api.p.rapidapi.com/data/CORE/IEX_TOPS/MSFT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-mash-market-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-mash-market-api.p.rapidapi.com/data/CORE/IEX_TOPS/{stock}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-mash-market-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
